data.name: ArgumentIsEmpty
data.value: The string argument '{argumentName}' cannot be empty.

data.name: InvalidEnumValue
data.value: The value provided for argument '{argumentName}' must be a valid value of enum type '{enumType}'.

data.name: DuplicateMigrationName
data.value: The name '{migrationName}' is used by an existing migration.

data.name: ContextAssemblyNotSpecified
data.value: Please specify an assembly that contains a class that derives from DbContext, using the ContextAssembly option.

data.name: AssemblyDoesNotContainType
data.value: The assembly '{contextAssemblyName}' does not contain the type '{contextTypeName}'.

data.name: TypeIsNotDbContext
data.value: The type '{contextTypeName}' does not derive from DbContext.

data.name: AssemblyDoesNotContainDbContext
data.value: The assembly '{contextAssemblyName}' does not contain a class that derives from DbContext.

data.name: AssemblyContainsMultipleDbContext
data.value: The assembly '{contextAssemblyName}' contains multiple classes that derive from DbContext. Please specify the context type using the ContextType option.

data.name: MigrationNameNotSpecified
data.value: Please specify a migration name using the MigrationName option.

data.name: InvalidMigrationSource
data.value: The source of migrations specified using the Source option must be one of the following: database, local, pending.

data.name: ToolUsage
data.value:
Usage:
<runner> command --option=value
Commands:
config Writes configuration create Scaffolds a new migration list Lists migrations script Generates SQL script apply Updates the database
Options:
config [--ContextAssembly=<assembly>] [--ContextType=<type>] [--MigrationAssembly=<assembly>] [--MigrationNamespace=<namespace>] [--MigrationDirectory=<directory>] [--ConfigFile=<file>]
create --MigrationName=<name> [--ConfigFile=<file>] [--ContextAssembly=<assembly>] [--ContextType=<type>] [--MigrationAssembly=<assembly>] [--MigrationNamespace=<namespace>] [--MigrationDirectory=<directory>]
list [--ConfigFile=<file>] [--MigrationSource=Database|Local|Pending] [--ContextAssembly=<assembly>] [--ContextType=<type>]
script [--ConfigFile=<file>] [--TargetMigration=<name>] [--ContextAssembly=<assembly>] [--ContextType=<type>] [--MigrationAssembly=<assembly>] [--MigrationNamespace=<namespace>] [--MigrationDirectory=<directory>]
apply [--ConfigFile=<file>] [--TargetMigration=<name>] [--ContextAssembly=<assembly>] [--ContextType=<type>] [--MigrationAssembly=<assembly>] [--MigrationNamespace=<namespace>] [--MigrationDirectory=<directory>]

data.name: SpecifiedContextNotFound
data.value: No class named '{contextName}' that derives from DbContext was found.

data.name: MultipleContextsFound
data.value: More than one class named '{contextName}' that derives from DbContext was found. Please specify the fully qualified name of the one to use.
